author: cnbc.com
title: Oclaro: Fiscal 3Q Earnings Snapshot
text:
SAN JOSE, Calif. (AP) _ Oclaro Inc. (OCLR) on Tuesday reported fiscal third-quarter net income of $10.8 million.
The San Jose, California-based company said it had profit of 6 cents per share. Earnings, adjusted for stock option expense and restructuring costs, came to 11 cents per share.
The results topped Wall Street expectations. The average estimate of eight analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of 8 cents per share.
The optical communications company posted revenue of $127.3 million in the period, meeting Street forecasts.
Oclaro shares have risen 26 percent since the beginning of the year. The stock has climbed slightly more than 1 percent in the last 12 months.
This story was generated by Automated Insights ( http://automatedinsights.com/ap ) using data from Zacks Investment Research. Access a Zacks stock report on OCLR at https://www.zacks.com/ap/OCLR
